001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003/**
004 * Custom exception for pokedex related error.
005 *
006 * @author fv
007 */
008 public final class PokedexException extends Exception {
009
010   /** Serialization index. **/
011   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
012
013   /**
014    * Default constructor.
015    *
016    * @param message Error message.
017    * @see Exception#Exception(String)
018    */
019   public PokedexException(final String message) {
020     super(message);
021   }
022
023 }
